column5: **PLEASE NOTE this listing is for Building Two Upstairs Only** There are two buildings side by side, Building One is the first one you will see as you drive to the studios. EXTRA GUEST CHARGE is only for 18 and older  Hike, bike, swim and explore on our 225 acre Organic Farm  Watch the beautiful sunrise on Montesino Mountain Dining, breweries, wineries, live music, shopping and and outdoor movie theatre - all within 20 minutes of Montesino Ranch
column8: Montesino Studio-2 UP, 225 acres, River access
